statements: SELECT * FROM tax_credits_and_incentives;
SELECT id, company_name, tax_credit_name FROM tax_credits_and_incentives;
SELECT company_name, tax_credit_amount FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE tax_credit_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE tax_credit_year = 2021;
SELECT company_name, tax_credit_name, tax_credit_amount FROM tax_credits_and_incentives ORDER BY tax_credit_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE tax_credit_amount > 1000 ORDER BY tax_credit_year DESC, company_name ASC
SELECT company_name, SUM(tax_credit_amount) AS total_amount FROM tax_credits_and_incentives GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT tax_credit_name FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE tax_credit_amount IS NULL
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE company_name LIKE '%Corp%' AND tax_credit_name LIKE 'Research%' ORDER BY company_name
SELECT id, company_name, tax_credit_year FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE tax_credit_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY tax_credit_year ASC, company_name DESC
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_info;
SELECT credit_name, eligibility_criteria FROM tax_credits_info ORDER BY credit_name DESC;
SELECT incentive_name, incentive_details FROM incentives_info WHERE applicable_region = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_info WHERE id > 3 AND id < 8;
SELECT credit_name, credit_description FROM tax_credits_info ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT credit_name, eligibility_criteria FROM tax_credits_info WHERE credit_name = 'Research Credit';
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_info WHERE credit_description LIKE '%small businesses%';
SELECT * FROM incentives_info WHERE applicable_region = 'Canada' ORDER BY incentive_name DESC;
SELECT incentive_name, incentive_details FROM incentives_info WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM tax_credits;
SELECT name, amount, start_date FROM tax_credits ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, name, industry, headquarters_location FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT id, name, percentage FROM incentives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, description FROM tax_credits WHERE amount > 500 AND description LIKE '%eligible%';
SELECT * FROM tax_credits WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, amount FROM tax_credits ORDER by amount DESC;
SELECT id, name, description FROM incentives WHERE start_date <= '2022-03-15' AND end_date >= '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' OR industry = 'Finance' ORDER BY established_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, headquarters_location FROM companies WHERE established_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2010-12-31';
SELECT credit_name, credit_amount FROM tax_credits;
SELECT * FROM tax_incentives WHERE incentive_amount > 1000;
SELECT taxpayer_name, taxpayer_address FROM taxpayers ORDER BY taxpayer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM tax_records WHERE tax_type = 'Income Tax';
SELECT credit_name, credit_amount, tax_year FROM tax_credits WHERE tax_year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits ORDER BY credit_amount DESC, tax_year ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT credit_name, credit_description FROM tax_credits WHERE credit_amount > 5000;
SELECT t.taxpayer_name, tr.tax_amount FROM taxpayers t JOIN tax_records tr ON t.taxpayer_id = tr.taxpayer_id WHERE tr.tax_type = 'Income Tax';
SELECT * FROM tax_incentives WHERE incentive_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 AND applicable_tax_category = 'Property Tax';
SELECT tr.tax_amount, t.taxpayer_name FROM tax_records tr JOIN taxpayers t ON tr.taxpayer_id = t.taxpayer_id WHERE tr.tax_year = 2021 ORDER BY tr.tax_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits;
SELECT tax_credit_name, start_date FROM tax_credits WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT business_name, industry, headquarters_location FROM businesses ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM contacts WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM applications WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT tax_credit_name, end_date FROM tax_credits ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT b.business_name, b.industry, t.tax_credit_name FROM businesses b INNER JOIN applications a ON b.business_id = a.business_id INNER JOIN tax_credits t ON a.tax_credit_id = t.tax_credit_id
SELECT c.full_name, c.email, c.role, a.status FROM contacts c INNER JOIN applications a ON c.contact_id = a.application_id WHERE a.status = 'pending'
SELECT b.business_name, b.headquarters_location, i.incentive_type FROM businesses b LEFT JOIN incentives i ON b.industry = i.incentive_type
